info.title: Coronavirus Greece API
info.description: A simple and fast API for tracking the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak in Greece. This project is developed by volunteers of [COVID-19 Response Greece](https://www.covid19response.gr/index_en.html). Project page: [Github](https://github.com/Covid-19-Response-Greece/covid19-greece-api).

get.summary: All the information about the cases
get.description: Get all the confirmed and fatal cases reported in Greece as timeseries
Get all the confirmed cases reported in Greece as timeseries
Get all the recovered cases reported in Greece as timeseries (Updating has stopped due to lack of reliable source)
Get all the deaths reported in Greece as timeseries
Get all the active cases reported in Greece as timeseries (Updating has stopped due to lack of reliable source concerning recovered cases)
Get the number of patients in intensive care units reported in Greece as timeseries
Get the number of tests performed in Greece as timeseries
Get the timeline of the age distribution of the cases reported in Greece
Get the total number of confirmed cases per region in Greece as timeseries

get.summary: Age distribution of male cases timeline
get.description: Get the timeline of the age distribution of the male cases reported in Greece

get.summary: Age distribution of female cases timeline
get.description: Get the timeline of the age distribution of the female cases reported in Greece
Get the timeline of vaccinations per region in Greece

get.summary: Hospital data from the Region of Western Macedonia
get.description: Get the daily reported data from the hospitals of Western Macedonia as timeseries
Get information of Covid-19 victims in Western Macedonia
Get information of Covid-19 spread in Refugee Camps
Get the latest cumulative data in Greece
Get the latest cumulative number of confirmed cases per region in Greece
Get the age distribution of the patients reported in Greece
Get the gender ratio of the patients reported in Greece as a percentage (%)
Get the gender and age distribution of the patients reported in Greece
Get the total vaccinations per region in Greece
Get the total vaccinations in Greece
Get the timeline of social distancing measures in Greece
Get the COVID risk levels in Greece

get.summary: Social distancing measures by risk level
get.description: Get the social distancing measures by risk level in Greece
Get info concerning Greek Schools Operation Changes due to Covid-19. Only schools which are not closed due to lockdown restrictions are included.
